hero-statue.title: Hero Statue
hero-statue.info.description: Adds a new block called the §nHero Statue§r, which can hold an item, and be posed using redstone.
hero-statue.info.important:
§f§lImportant§r
If you have a slower computer, have a lot of statues placed down, or are using a resource intensive shader pack, you may want to change your statue render type config to §nBasic§r.
This renders statues using block models, which is a lot faster, however it does disable visual posing.
hero-statue.info.features.hero_statue.ho: - You can give the statue an item to display by interacting with it whilst holding the item.
hero-statue.info.features.hero_statue.po: - You can pose the statue using redstone.
- This is configurable via the §nhero-statue$allowRedstoneChangeStatuePose§r gamerule, which is ON by default.
- The statue remembers the last set pose when turned off.
- You can pose the statue by interacting with empty hands or when the statue already has an item, if the §nhero-statue$allowPlayerChangeStatuePose§r gamerule is active.
- The statue remembers the last set pose when turned off.
hero-statue.info.features.hero_statue.co: - Comparators output the level of redstone required to set the current pose.
hero-statue.info.features.hero_statue.ra: - You can make the statues eyes cycle through the rainbow by giving the statue an item named §njeb_§r, or by turning the §nRAINBOW MODE§r config on.
- You can also enable this in creative, by setting the §nhero_statue_rainbow§r blockstate with a debug stick or with commands.
- This only works with the §nDefault§r render type, and if you are not using shaders.
hero-statue.info.features.hero_statue.up: - You can make the statue render upside down by giving the statue an item named §nDinnerbone§r, §nGrumm§r, §nlegotaylor§r, or §ndannnytaylor§r.
- This only works with the §nDefault§r and §nVanilla§r render types.
hero-statue.render_type.fancy.hover: The recommended option! Renders models using custom core shaders.
hero-statue.render_type.fast.hover: Renders model using vanilla shaders. This will prevent §4R§6A§eI§aN§9B§dO§5W§r MODE, and any other custom effects from being rendered.
hero-statue.render_type.faster.hover: Renders as a Block Model. This will be a lot faster, but you won't get poses, the eye overlay, or easter eggs.
hero-statue.eye_overlay.hover: When disabled, prevents the eye overlay from rendering.
hero-statue.allow_network_config_updates: Allows server operators to remotely change your config options, except for this one.
